name: Nablin Loot
description:
In Nablin Loot you are a small elf who wanders the forest looking for unsuspecting heroes and travellers to steal loot from. If the poor sod you steal from wakes up you'll need to use your ill begotten goods to make your escape!

Hide behind bushes, throw potions, plant seeds, creep in the shadows. Can you get all the loot before they wake up?

This is an early gameplay test for a pixelish game our studio is working on. We hope to polish it off and release it for real sometime this year. Thanks for looking.
